saf.core.ui.event

Interface DockableSelectionListener


  • public interface DockableSelectionListener
    Interface for classes that want to be notified when the dockable frame selection changes.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $ $Date: 2005/11/21 18:55:17 $
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void selectionGained(DockableSelectionEvent evt)
      Called whenever dockable frame is selected.
      void selectionLost(DockableSelectionEvent evt)
      Called whenever a dockable frame looses selection.

    • Method Detail

      • selectionGained

        void selectionGained(DockableSelectionEvent evt)
        Called whenever dockable frame is selected.
        Parameters:
        evt - the event describing the selection

      • selectionLost

        void selectionLost(DockableSelectionEvent evt)
        Called whenever a dockable frame looses selection.
        Parameters:
        evt - the event describing the selection
